Text.Page: <PCNAME> crossed the Infernal Span and destroyed the siege cannons protecting Trellum Consurgo. After sweeping through the Furyguard defenders, <PCNAME> joined Rhodos to press the attack.

We can't take the fortress unless we silence the guns on top of the wall. To do that, we need to get to them, but their crossfire will smash any assault.

If your magical people cannot save the demokons, can they protect us?

This draught should protect you against the worst of the blast. Won't be perfect, of course, but you should survive.

But try not to dawdle once you drink it.

, down there!

The archdevas don't realize we've gotten inside! Now's our chance to catch them unawares!

Our losses weren't as heavy as I'd feared. Well done.

Are you ready to end this?
